entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 06:30 AM NST Friday 20 January 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: NNW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 20 January 2023
